ClinicalDocument.title: Community Health and Hospitals: Health Summary(Example)

tr.td: Marla came to my office on April 23. She wasn't healthy.
Marla has diabetes. She doesn't exercise.
Now Marla has bronchitis. She might get emphysema. She should stop smoking.
She has lower back pain. She doesn't exercise. She just watches TV.
Marla should not eat so much.

substanceAdministration.text: Propranolol Extended Release 60 mg, 1 tablet each morning
